title: I'll Be Glad When You're Dead You Rascal You

sources.title: I'll Be Glad When You're Dead You Rascal You (1932)
sources.description: Betty Boop and friends meet Louis Armstrong on a jungle safari. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ill-be-glad-when-youre-dead-you-rascal-you-1932/

metadata.Plot: Koko and Bimbo take Betty Boop on a jungle safari, where they run afoul of a cannibal tribe caricaturing Louis Armstrong and his band members (they play the title song, partly in live-action).
metadata.Actors: Louis Armstrong, Ann Little, Louis Armstrong and His Orchestra
